article.title: Northrop to Operate and Maintain GUAVA Sensors
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Space and Mission Systems Incorporated, Fairfax, Virginia, was awarded a $10,720,446 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for the operations and maintenance services for the GUAVA family of sensors systems. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Natick, Massachusetts, is the contracting activity.
